titles.title: GRIDD Act of 2015
Guiding Responsible and Improved Disability Decisions Act of 2015
A bill to require the Commissioner of Social Security to update the medical-vocational guidelines used in disability determinations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
5/5/2015--Introduced. Guiding Responsible and Improved Disability Decisions Act of 2015 or the GRIDD Act of 2015
The Commissioner of Social Security shall prescribe rules and regulations that update medical-vocational guidelines used in disability determinations.
